import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import DropDown from '../Assests/images/DropDown.svg'; import Inputarea from './Inputarea' import Plus from '../Assests/images/Plus.svg' import userContext from './UserContext'; import Minus from '../Assests/images/minus.png'; import WeeklyUpdate from './WeeklyForm/WeeklyUpdate'; const CommonDropDown = () => { const [designer, setDesigner] = useState(0); const [frontEnd, setFrontEnd] = useState(0); const [backEnd, setBackEnd] = useState(0); const [qa, setQA] = useState(0); const [total, setTotal] = useState(0); const [perform, setPerform] = useState(false); const data = { "data": 8, "Designer" : 3 } return (
{/* {console.log(value)} */}
{total} setPerform(!perform)} />
{(perform)?(
Designer
{ setDesigner(designer + 1); setTotal(total + 1) }} src={Plus} /> {designer} { setDesigner(designer - 1); setTotal(total - 1) }} src={Minus} />
Front End Developer
{ setFrontEnd(frontEnd + 1); setTotal(total + 1) }} src={Plus} /> {frontEnd} { setFrontEnd(frontEnd - 1); setTotal(total - 1) }} src={Minus} />
Back End Developer
{ setBackEnd(backEnd + 1); setTotal(total + 1) }} src={Plus} /> {backEnd} { setBackEnd(backEnd - 1); setTotal(total - 1) }} src={Minus} />
QA
{ setQA(qa + 1); setTotal(total + 1) }} src={Plus} /> {qa} { setQA(qa - 1); setTotal(total - 1) }} src={Minus} />
):"" }
) } export default CommonDropDown
